events.message: We have received your application for the software engineer role and appreciate your interest in joining our development team.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering cluster since you mentioned experience in software development and devops roles.
A recruiter has been assigned to your case and will be your point of contact throughout the interview process.
We conducted an initial screening call to discuss your background in software engineering and verify your technical skills and availability.
The candidate responded promptly expressing enthusiasm about the role and providing additional details on previous development projects.
We scheduled a technical interview for May 15th to evaluate your coding skills and problem-solving abilities with our engineering team.
You successfully completed the technical interview and impressed the panel with your knowledge of software development best practices and devops experience.
The HR interview has been scheduled for May 18th to discuss cultural fit, benefits, and company policies.
